article: us secretary of state colin powell on thursday lamented the lack of progress in middle east peace efforts but said the naming of a palestinian prime minister had created a `` new dynamic '' that he hoped would rekindle those attempts .
abstract: powell says naming of new palestinian pm creates new dynamic
